title: I need help with my fps
body:
my fps normally can reach up 200 but for some reason it is now capped at 60 and i cant change it
i have an asus rog gl551jw-ds71

replies.body: I found a solution Disable the XBoX Game Bar, and make sure your framerate is uncapped in League settings.

This happened to me too. They updated the game and no longer works for windows 10. Just use the compatibility mode and revert to windows 7. Your fps issue will fix.

If you need help with that let me know.

> [{quoted}](name=Ooray,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=miam5zyn,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-09-01T16:00:07.151+0000)
>
> did this happen this patch?

sorry for late reply, but no. This happened like 3 or 4 patches ago I think
does riot know about this and are they trying to fix it?

> [{quoted}](name=Ooray,realm=EUW,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=miam5zyn,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2016-09-02T18:42:11.278+0000)
>
> does riot know about this and are they trying to fix it?

they won't fix it. They will just tell you to try their solutions even though they haven't worked for me unless you do what I did
im gonna report it as a bug.
did this happen this patch? and is there a way to keep windows 10 and not revert

Your PC might just need a general tune up to get things back in business!  Regular check ups like updated your drivers can help, but I also recommend going over our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help.  It should be smooth sailing after that!
i did everything. nothing has worked

No worries, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can look into this for you.  You can also use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to automatically gather a set of logs to give some context.  We'll respond asap!
